name: Xtreme Crop Duster Simulator '82
description:
Xtreme Crop Duster Simulator '82 is a Commodore 64-style side scrolling flight simulator, made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 34.

Controls are just up and down arrows on a keyboard, or up and down axis on a joystick.

Ludum Dare entry page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=39055
